question:
Your friend invited you to his party but your are unable to attend. Write a letter to your friend. In your letter 
1. Explain why you can’t come 
2. Give your reason for not contacting your friend sooner 
3. Suggest another time to meet
text: I am writing to say to you, unfortunately, I can not attend  your ceremony because I have promised  my mother that I come to her home and fixed her chair, in addition, after that I should go to the hospital for checking on myself.

If I want to be honest with you, it is a part of me who forgot that call you early because my work environment is really noisy also I do not have a focus on my work this is a reason for this issue furthermore, Since I was a child, I used to forget everything

I want to apologize to you due to this late and I really like to see you this week on Wednesday, of course, if you do not have any problem at this time, I will invite you to a new restaurant on the main street.
I am looking forward to hearing your response.

error_list.error_des: It appears that you have an unnecessary comma before the dependent clause marker Since. Consider removing the comma.
